entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -19.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 02:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -19.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.7°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries in onshore winds. Local amount 2 cm in onshore winds. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in onshore winds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in onshore winds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
